tool.name: anvi-show-collections-and-bins
tool.description: A script to display collections stored in an anvi'o profile or pan database.

param.name: input_pan_or_profile_db
param.label: Pan Or Profile Db
param.help: Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts).

tool.help:
usage: anvi-show-collections-and-bins [-h] -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB
A script to display collections stored in an anvi'o profile or pan database.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB, --pan-or-profile-db PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts).
